mozilla.components.browser.session

Class Observer.DefaultImpls

  • mozilla.components.browser.session.SessionManager.Observer.DefaultImpls
  • Enclosing interface:
    SessionManager.Observer

    public static class Observer.DefaultImpls

    Interface to be implemented by classes that want to observe the session manager.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void onAllSessionsRemoved(SessionManager.Observer $this)
      All sessions have been removed. Note that this will callback will be invoked whenever removeAll() or removeSessions have been called on the SessionManager. This callback will NOT be invoked when just the last session has been removed by calling remove() on the SessionManager.
      static void onSessionAdded(SessionManager.Observer $this, Session session)
      The given session has been added.
      static void onSessionRemoved(SessionManager.Observer $this, Session session)
      The given session has been removed.
      static void onSessionSelected(SessionManager.Observer $this, Session session)
      The selection has changed and the given session is now the selected session.

    • Method Detail

      • onSessionSelected

        public static void onSessionSelected(SessionManager.Observer $this,
                                     Session session)

        The selection has changed and the given session is now the selected session.

      • onSessionAdded

        public static void onSessionAdded(SessionManager.Observer $this,
                                  Session session)

        The given session has been added.

      • onSessionRemoved

        public static void onSessionRemoved(SessionManager.Observer $this,
                                    Session session)

        The given session has been removed.

      • onAllSessionsRemoved

        public static void onAllSessionsRemoved(SessionManager.Observer $this)

        All sessions have been removed. Note that this will callback will be invoked whenever removeAll() or removeSessions have been called on the SessionManager. This callback will NOT be invoked when just the last session has been removed by calling remove() on the SessionManager.
